webscript.description:
Document Library: Tree Component this component display a tree, selecting a node fire FilterChange event, document list update the contents using "metadata" filter type see filters.lib.js > parseAdvancedSearch
  • {nodeType} : the QName of the node type
  • {assoType} : the association used to link parent to children
  • {nodeTypeDocument} : the type of document that refert to nodes
  • {assoTypeDocument} : the association used by document to refert to nodes
  • {selectableTypeIsAspect} : true if the nodeType and nodeTypeDocument is an Aspect
  • {rootProperty} : the boolean property used to set a node as root
  • {rootName} : the root cm:name value
you can used SIDE built-in model (buildInLibraryAlfresco) that includes Aspect usable with this filter if you do not use built-in model you must setup component instance by setting in template instance
